summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2429 for the improvement of Sixth Avenue South, from Seattle Boulevard to Holgate Street; Holgate Street from Sixth Avenue South to Ninth Avenue South, and Ninth Avenue Sourth from Holgate Street to College Street, all in the City of Seattle, by the placing of an asphalt top on the existing planking on said streets; under Ordinance No. 25551, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
